headline.main: A Pollution Emergency Curtails Steel Output in Pittsburgh Area; POLLUTION PERIL GRIPS PITTSBURGH

docs.lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH, Nov. 19--As many as 30 industrial plants in the Pittsburgh area were forced to curtail operations today as a weather inversion caused air pollution levels to soar to the highest levels since the establishment of Allegheny County's monitoring system.

headline.main: A Pollution Emergency Curtails Steel Output in Pittsburgh Area; POLLUTION PERIL GRIPS PITTSBURGH

docs.abstract: Air pollution emergency declared in Pittsburgh, Pa, area by Allegheny County Comrs as weather inversion causes air pollution reading to rise to 249 on scale of 300 in Monogahela and Yougiogheny River Valleys; AP repts US Steel Corp was ordered to shut down Clairton Coke Works as result of air pollution emergency; warnings issued for persons with respiratory or heart conditions (M)
